Reference

All functions

get_field_id()

Retrieve the id for a field in a table

get_linear_lincomb()

Calculate the matrix for linear combinations of strata

get_nonlinear_lincomb()

Calculate the matrix for linear combinations of strata

moving_trend()

Create weight matrix for linear trend over a moving window

prepare_analysis()

Prepare all datasets and a to do list of models

prepare_analysis_composite()

Prepare the analysis files for the composite indices

prepare_analysis_dataset()

Create the analysis dataset based on the available raw data

prepare_dataset()

Prepare all datasets

prepare_dataset_location()

import and store location metadata

prepare_dataset_observation()

Read the observations and save them to git and the results database

prepare_dataset_species()

Read the species groups and save them to git and the results database

retrieve_results()

Retrieve the relevant results

select_relevant()

Select the relevant observation of a species

storage()

store the n2kModel and retrieve its fingerprints
